name: SetVehicleParamsCarDoors
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3.7  and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Allows you to open and close the doors of a vehicle.

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle to set the door state of

params_body.name: driver
params_body.description: The state of the driver's door. 1 to open, 0 to close.

params_body.name: passenger
params_body.description: The state of the passenger door. 1 to open, 0 to close.

params_body.name: backleft
params_body.description: The state of the rear left door (if available). 1 to open, 0 to close.

params_body.name: backright
params_body.description: The state of the rear right door (if available). 1 to open, 0 to close.

related_fn:
GetVehicleParamsCarDoors: Retrive the current state of a vehicle's doors.
 SetVehicleParamsCarWindows: Open and close the windows of a vehicle.
 GetVehicleParamsCarWindows: Retrive the current state of a vehicle's windows
